name: Skill Hability Tree
description:
This is a small prototype of a skill tree with a Point-buy system made in Unity

Elements used in this project: 

  1. DoTween
  2. Coroutines
  3. Event Trigers
  • The art in the Spells comes from: https://opengameart.org/users/cethiel 
  • The art on the Item description comes from: https://aeynit.itch.io/fantasy-icons-symbols-pack
